post:
Get ready to celebrate our new Location in the Netherlands with us!
After successfully launching the Austrian (Vienna) location last year,
now the new Location in Appeldoorn is live!

Why choose us? Our shared web-hosting plans take resources on a powerful
Server with SSD-Disks and shares them (CPU and RAM) between the clients.
This is very efficient as well as cost-effective. You will get 99.9% uptime
guaranteed, a powerful Control-Panel and more.

>New Location Celebration!
>**25% OFF Your First YEAR!**
> 
> Promotional **Code: WelcomeToTheNetherlands2021**



**Web-Hosting Plans:**

**Small**
**5 GB SSD** Storage
50 GB Traffic
5 User Accounts
1 MySQL Database
Free SSL (Letsencrypt)
Host 1 Website
=> Order this hosting Package: **[10 Euro / Year](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/SmallHosting/?group_id=19&pricing_id=159&coupon=WelcomeToTheNetherlands2021 "10 Euro / Year")**

**Medium**
**15 GB SSD** Storage
100 GB Traffic
10 User Accounts
2 MySQL Databases
1 Postgres Database
Free SSL (Letsencrypt)
Host 5 Website
=> Order this hosting Package: **[20 Euro / Year](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/RegularHosting/?group_id=20&pricing_id=160&coupon=WelcomeToTheNetherlands2021 "20 Euro / Year")**


**Large**
**30 GB SSD** Storage
200 GB Traffic
25 User Accounts
3 MySQL Databases
3 Postgres Database
Free SSL (Letsencrypt)
Host 10 Website
=> Order this hosting Package: **[40 Euro / Year](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/LargeHosting/?group_id=21&pricing_id=161&coupon=WelcomeToTheNetherlands2021 "40 Euro / Year")**

_All prices excl. VAT if applicable.
Offer ends 1st of April 2021_

[Compare Plans on the Website](https://myroot.pw/hosting.php "Compare Plans on the Website")
